description: Describes a dataset import job created using the CreateDatasetImportJob operation. In addition to listing the parameters provided in the CreateDatasetImportJob request, this operation includes the following properties:

parameters.name: DatasetImportJobArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset import job.

nested_items.name: DatasetImportJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset import job.

nested_items.name: DatasetImportJobArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset import job.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that the training data was imported to.

nested_items.name: TimestampFormat
nested_items.description: The format of timestamps in the dataset. The format that you specify depends on the DataFrequency specified when the dataset was created. The following formats are supported.
'yyyy-MM-dd' For the following data frequencies: Y, M, W, and D.
'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' For the following data frequencies: H, 30min, 15min, and 1min; and optionally, for: Y, M, W, and D.

nested_items.name: TimeZone
nested_items.description: The single time zone applied to every item in the dataset.

nested_items.name: UseGeolocationForTimeZone
nested_items.description: Whether TimeZone is automatically derived from the geolocation attribute.

nested_items.name: GeolocationFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the geolocation attribute. Valid Values: "LAT_LONG" and "CC_POSTALCODE".

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The location of the training data to import and an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the data.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket or file(s) in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the Amazon S3 bucket or files. If you provide a value for the KMSKeyArn key, the role must allow access to the key.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Key Management Service (KMS) key.

nested_items.name: EstimatedTimeRemainingInMinutes
nested_items.description: The estimated time remaining in minutes for the dataset import job to complete.

nested_items.name: FieldStatistics
nested_items.description: Statistical information about each field in the input data.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The number of values in the field. If the response value is -1, refer to CountLong.

nested_items.name: CountDistinct
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in the field. If the response value is -1, refer to CountDistinctLong.

nested_items.name: CountNull
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the field. If the response value is -1, refer to CountNullLong.

nested_items.name: CountNan
nested_items.description: The number of NAN (not a number) values in the field. If the response value is -1, refer to CountNanLong.

nested_items.name: Min
nested_items.description: For a numeric field, the minimum value in the field.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: For a numeric field, the maximum value in the field.

nested_items.name: Avg
nested_items.description: For a numeric field, the average value in the field.

nested_items.name: Stddev
nested_items.description: For a numeric field, the standard deviation.

nested_items.name: CountLong
nested_items.description: The number of values in the field. CountLong is used instead of Count if the value is greater than 2,147,483,647.

nested_items.name: CountDistinctLong
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in the field. CountDistinctLong is used instead of CountDistinct if the value is greater than 2,147,483,647.

nested_items.name: CountNullLong
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the field. CountNullLong is used instead of CountNull if the value is greater than 2,147,483,647.

nested_items.name: CountNanLong
nested_items.description: The number of NAN (not a number) values in the field. CountNanLong is used instead of CountNan if the value is greater than 2,147,483,647.

nested_items.name: DataSize
nested_items.description: The size of the dataset in gigabytes (GB) after the import job has finished.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset import job. States include:
ACTIVE.
CREATE_PENDING, CREATE_IN_PROGRESS, CREATE_FAILED.
DELETE_PENDING, DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, DELETE_FAILED.
CREATE_STOPPING, CREATE_STOPPED.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, an informational message about the error.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the dataset import job was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the resource was modified. The timestamp depends on the status of the job:
CREATE_PENDING - The CreationTime.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPING - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPED - When the job stopped.
ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED - When the job finished or failed.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the imported data, CSV or PARQUET.

nested_items.name: ImportMode
nested_items.description: The import mode of the dataset import job, FULL or INCREMENTAL.
